name: MusicGroup
description: A musical group, such as a band, an orchestra, or a choir. Can also be a solo musician.
title: MusicGroup

fields.name: track
fields.title: track
fields.description: A music recording (track)—usually a single song. If an ItemList is given, the list should contain items of type MusicRecording.

fields.name: genre
fields.title: genre
fields.description: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group.

fields.name: tracks
fields.title: tracks
fields.description: A music recording (track)—usually a single song.

fields.name: musicGroupMember
fields.title: musicGroupMember
fields.description: A member of a music group—for example, John, Paul, George, or Ringo.
